TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs

summary.span: 表示非同步作業中所報告的進度資料。

span.span: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含屬性，描述進度， ，和事件。This class contains properties that describe progress for the , , and events. 此類別中的並非每個屬性會套用至每個事件。Not every property in this class applies to each event. 和代表總位元組數分別下載至日期和下載作業中的位元組總數，而適用於所有三個事件。 and represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events. 名稱對應至目前的檔案群組事件，以及反映下載作業的目前階段。 names the file group corresponding to the current event, and reflects the current stage of the download operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesCompleted As Long
public: property long BytesCompleted { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個作業已經下載的位元組數目。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.

value.span: 表示已經傳輸的資料，以位元組為單位。

span.span: An representing the data already transferred, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如、屬性參考到下載部署資訊清單。For , the property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest. 如，屬性參考到整個更新，包含的下載進度的資訊清單、 組件和資料檔案。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files. 如，屬性參考到完整的具名群組一部分的檔案的下載進度。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesTotal As Long
public: property long BytesTotal { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得下載作業中的位元組總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.

value.span: ，表示下載的總大小，以位元組為單位。

span.span: An representing the total size of the download, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如、屬性參考到下載部署資訊清單。For , the property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest. 如，屬性參考到整個更新，包含的下載進度的資訊清單、 組件和資料檔案。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files. 如，屬性參考到完整的具名群組一部分的檔案的下載進度。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Group As String
public: property System::String ^ Group { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得正在下載的檔案群組名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.

value.span: 如果事件是由於呼叫 而發生的，則為包含檔案群組名稱的 ，否則為長度為零的字串。

span.span: A containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to ; otherwise, a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以起始多次呼叫並同時下載多個檔案群組。You can initiate multiple calls to and download multiple file groups simultaneously. 使用回呼對應至這些群組來判斷哪些事件。Use to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As DeploymentProgressState

summary.span: 取得處理序目前正在執行的動作。

span.span: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.

value.span: 值，表示作業目前正在下載的一或多個項目。

span.span: A value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
